title: TAHAP FINAL - Kirim entri Anda dan menangkan 2.000 SBD
body:
##
Tahap Semi Final selesai beberapa menit yang lalu dan kami sudah tahu untuk pertandingan final dan tempat ketiga
![Screenshot_2018-06-06-16-03-40-66-01.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmean4UBKaLD256EzB5zFJsJhrfzYrEDXdRoHYUxZpaSig/Screenshot_2018-06-06-16-03-40-66-01.jpeg) Seperti yang sudah Anda ketahui, @blocktrades suka mensponsori proyek keterlibatan komunitas jenis ini dan @anomadsoul & @acidyo juga tahu, banyak Steemian menyukai game ini, jadi kami memutuskan untuk menyelenggarakan acara kontes Piala Dunia Sepakbola yang sangat besar ini. Dengan hanya menyisakan dua pertandingan di depan, beberapa orang sudah terlalu jauh untuk didekati orang lain dan hanya ada beberapa orang yang benar-benar dapat memenangkan piala dan mendapatkan bagian dari kolam hadiah. ####
Untuk tetap berpartisipasi, nama Anda HARUS DI DAFTAR INI dan Anda harus membuat postingan memilih setiap pemenang untuk 2 pertandingan terakhir, pertandingan final dan perebutan tempat ketiga. Anda harus memasukkan skor yang Anda pikir akan terjadi pada 2 game ini dalam waktu Reguler (hanya 90 menit waktu normal) :
*** ###
France vs Croatia
###
Belgium vs England
*** ####
ANDA HARUS MENGGUNAKAN TEMPLATE DI BAWAH INI UNTUK MEMBUAT POSTINGAN ANDA. INGAT NAMA TIM HARUS DALAM BAHASA INGGRIS. KAMI REKOMENDASIKAN UNTUK MENYALIN DAN MENEMPEL TABLE BERIKUT INI UNTUK MEMBUAT POSTINGAN ANDA, HANYA TINGGAL MENGISI SKOR PREDIKSI ANDA. SKOR HARUS DIPERTIMBANGKAN UNTUK 90 MENIT WAKTU NORMAL, JADI BISA SAJA HASILNYA SERI
***
Klick di sini untuk menyalin Tabel
*** ####
Salin tabel di atas dan tempelkan di steemit.com atau editor post busy.org Anda dan tabel akan ditampilkan seperti ini :
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- - | France | vs | Croatia | - - | Belgium | vs | England | - ##
Peraturan :
1 - Judul posting Anda harus : The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals 2 -Dalam posting Anda, Anda harus menyertakan tautan ke pengumuman ini. 3 - Gunakan format yang disertakan pada posting ini untuk membuat prediksi Anda sehingga kami dapat mengatur setiap entri. 4 - Gunakan tag "blocktradesworldcup" dan tag "mypicks" 5 - Resteem posting ini. Kami membutuhkan semua orang untuk melihat postingan ini sehingga tidak ada yang tertinggal. 6 - Anda tidak dapat mengedit posting Anda setelah pertandingan pertama dari tahap ini dimulai. 7 - Reputasi Minimum untuk berpartisipasi adalah 40. Ini untuk menghindari bot bergabung dan kami akan memeriksa bahwa para pemenang ADALAH STEEMIAN YANG AKTIF DAN NYATA. 8 - Anda dapat mengirimkan entri Anda hingga 14 Juli 2018 pukul 16:59, UTC + 3 Zona waktu. Jika Anda tidak tahu zona waktu itu, periksa disini : 9 - Hanya orang yang namanya tercantum dalam daftar ini ini yang dapat berpartisipasi. ##
Scoring
###
Anda harus memasukkan skor untuk prediksi ini. Untuk setiap skor yang benar Anda akan mendapatkan tiga (3) poin. Jika Anda hanya mendapatkan yang menang tetapi Anda tidak mendapatkan skor yang benar, Anda akan diberikan satu (1) poin.
***
Selamat mencoba semuanya dan biarkan prediksi dimulai!

Anda dapat mengirimkan entri Anda hingga 14 Juli 2018 pukul 16:59, UTC + 3 Zona waktu.

author: saifulanwar
title: France Vs Croatia in World Cup Final: Schedule, Head-to-head
body:
<center>![pi.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUa7unRdkikyPbqshsrnY1qHzGorWCvWL9en1PKRZwN5s/pi.png)</center>
Hello all steemit lovers all over the world France and Croatia will face each other in the 2018 World Cup final. The match will take place on Sunday, July 15, 2018, starting at 22:00 pm.

France qualified for the top of the party by beating Belgium 1-0. While Croatia drove with England bend 2-1.

<center>![Gambar Bendera-Negara Prancis.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSeFEu2rdxwAjY17p2iN1gGQP14Lt2V5r4tZi7aXx15CS/Gambar%20Bendera-Negara%20Prancis.gif)</center>
Both teams previously played five times. France have won three matches, while the other two produced a draw.

The first match took place on July 8, 1998, in the World Cup semifinals. Les Bleus won 2-1 and advanced to the final and then beat Brazil 3-0.
<center>![croatia.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZJ243XcFdKSknYcW2CLEUzomJyaxrgGyys1H4LAV44k1/croatia.gif)</center>

France and Croatia last met each other in March 2011 in an international friendly, but a 0-0 draw.

# <center> France vs Croatia</center>

To keep participating, you have to make a post picking each winner of the next 4 games. You have to include the score you think will happen on these 4 games in Regual time (only the first 90 minutes):
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
W | France | vs | Croatia | L


Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | France | vs | Croatia | 1

# Head-to-head France vs Croatia:
July 8, 1998: France 2, Croatia 1 at Stade de France (Paris)
13 November 1999: France 3, Croatia 0 at Stade de France (Paris)
28 May 2000: France 2, Croatia 0 in Maksimir (Zagreb, Croatia)
June 17, 2004: France 2, Croatia 2 at Estadio Dr. Magalhaes Pessoa (Leiria, Portugal)
29 March 2011: France 0, Croatia 0 at Stade de France (Paris).

author: saiful46
title: Croatian President Keeps Attention at World Cup 2018
body:
Hello everyone loves steemit sports trophy 2018 Croatia's President, Kolinda Grabar-Kitarovic, became one of the world's most highlighted leaders, especially after the country qualified for the 2018 World Cup final. His action supporting the team while in Russia made many netizens impressed.
<center>![1.3.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmd8T4HFxEdXjCj6mYgFF6xPHBwqEj9FRegEJ9QmTknGnB/1.3.jpg)</center>

Croatia's first female president was very "populist" in supporting the team. While heading to watch the top 16, he boarded an economy class plane with supporters. He also watched the semi-final match between Croatia and Denmark in the stands with other supporters.

<center>![maskot dan logo Piala Dunia 2018 Russia.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVtjsBYuEgkprnRiN6kDBiCT694GemMZF4sKSsN5yXHiw/maskot%20dan%20logo%20Piala%20Dunia%202018%20Russia.jpg)</center>

After the game, he went to the dressing room. He reportedly hugged all the players, who were on average half naked. Now the photos as he embraced the player then many outstanding and become viral. The netizens were amazed: The female president did not hesitate to hug players who some only wore loincloths.

<center>![1.4.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPaxWwH1KLJgDvVz3d5q13y8VVSBJQcyyPQpKyTvzAEdr/1.4.jpg)</center>

When Croatia against Russia in the quarter-finals, Kolinda Grabar-Kitarovic, watch in VIP stands with FIFA President Gianni Infantino. But, at that time, he did not hesitate berselebrasi while standing and dancing while raising his hand when his team scored.

When Croatia against England in the semi-finals on Thursday morning, Madam President was absent on the pitch. He had to attend the NATO meeting in Brussels, Beglia.

<center>![croatia.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZJ243XcFdKSknYcW2CLEUzomJyaxrgGyys1H4LAV44k1/croatia.gif)</center>
But, he still supports his team in different ways. Prior to the event he gave the Croatian T-shirt numbered 10 to the British Prime Minister, Theresa May. He also gave T-shirt number 9 for US President Donald Trump.

<center>![download (6).jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUbyCzQ8WtBzGkuPGowVbfoT6fBu2uCRCRNYwxMZafngD/download%20(6).jpg)</center>

In the final, Kolinda Grabar-Kitarovic most likely will not miss an opportunity to directly watch the game versus Croatia versus France. The match will take place in Moscow on July 15. What many people will be waiting for is whether he will be present at the public stand or in the VIP and what his style will be in his side's support.

<center>![pi.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUa7unRdkikyPbqshsrnY1qHzGorWCvWL9en1PKRZwN5s/pi.png)</center>

author: anak123
title: World Cup 2018: Silenced Croatia, It's 3 English Mistakes
body:
<center>![1.1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWcRCfptxCbkpBZkr7BwZMvnDLnQ454CRJV2EopFfkr3k/1.1.jpg)</center>
Hello every football world football football 2018 Step England in the 2018 World Cup must be stalled after fall 1-2 of Croatia in the semi-final match early this morning. England had a better lead through Kieran Trippier's free-kick goal in the 5th minute. But Ivan Perisic equalized in the 68th minute. Mario Mandzukic's goal in extra round also returned Harry Kane cs.
<center>![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)</center>
Had a good performance in the first half, England's performance seemed to relax in the second half. As a result of Croatia led by Luka Modric able to dictate the course of the game.
<center>![download (6).jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUbyCzQ8WtBzGkuPGowVbfoT6fBu2uCRCRNYwxMZafngD/download%20(6).jpg)</center>
Strategically, at least England made three mistakes in the game. Coach Garet Southgate did not seem too sensitive to see the development of the game in the second half. Here are the three mistakes.
1. Play survive after halftime.
The former captain and England striker, Alan Shearer, assessed England's first mistake was to play defensive in the second half. England seem to be waiting more for Croatia in their own defense area than pressing any other opponent who controls the ball.
This is understandable because they were winning 1-0 at the time. Coach Gareth Southgate seems to want to try to maintain the condition while saving power for the final fight.
But giving Croatia the freedom to control the ball is a mistake. The vision of playing Luka Modric was allowed to flourish and ended in defeat for the Three Lions squad.
2. Do not change the scheme and late enter Eric Dier.
If any want to play defense, Southgate should change his team's game scheme. He should be able to change the 3-5-2 that he applied in the first half to 4-5-1 in the second half.
Southgate should be able to attract one of his players in the line of attack like Jesse Lingard or Rahem Sterling and enter Eric Dier. It is important to guard the movement of Luka Modric.
Dier proved to be able to turn off Modric when defending Tottenham. In the Champions League group stage match last season, he became one of the keys to Tottenham's successful silencing of Real Madrid which strengthened Modric. Tottenham able to balance Real Madrid 1-1 in the match at the Santiago Bernabeu and won 3-1 at Wembley Stadium.
3. Prevent cross feeding.
Croatia must be recognized to have power through attack from the side of the wing. They have Ivan Perisic on the left side and Ante Rabic or Sime Vrsljko on the right side. Croatia's two goals in the game early this morning was started from the attack on the wing.
It was already known to Southgate early on. The unfortunate thing is England can not dampen cross passes from the side of the wing.
Again, it can actually be done by changing the game scheme to 4-5-1 in the second half. With such a scheme, the burden of Kieran Trippier and Ashley Young is likely to be lighter and they can prevent two goals that goalkeeper Jordan Pickford.
With the defeat of England must be content to compete for the third title against Belgium on Saturday. While Croatia will fight with France to bring the title of World Cup 2018.

author: saiful46
title: World Cup 2018: England out, this is Mourinho's word
body:
<center>![11.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdwVw6ZYe4vcaTEfH9t3e4saSYdZ388xo3AwoGJw3hnyB/11.jpg)</center>
Hello everyone loves steemit world cup sport 2018, Manchester United coach, Jose Mourinho, said the England national team deserved to cry for being knocked out of the 2018 World Cup after losing to Croatia in the semi-final match on Thursday morning. Even so, he admitted optimistic about the future of the Three Lions squad.

***The performance of the England team has increased when compared with previous appearances. They are a team filled with young players. The majority of them will play in the next World Cup with a more mature experience***.

<center>![2.4.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZbhvSptrnpMT72DbHLYgJiwCUN8ogLQstwXkku5NA5tZ/2.4.jpg)</center>

Mourinho also praised the performance of England coach, Gareth Southgate, and his assistant, Steve Holland. He advised the Football Association (FA) to continue to use the services of both coaches for the 2020 European Cup and the next World Cup.

**The England national team players and everyone involved in this World Cup will be entitled to return home with great pride once they have made everything to make their country proud**.

<center>![1.5.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWcRCfptxCbkpBZkr7BwZMvnDLnQ454CRJV2EopFfkr3k/1.5.jpg)</center>
In addition, Mourinho recognizes the greatness of Croatia who can make up for the final round at this World Cup. According to him, the result is a great achievement for a country whose majority of players play in clubs outside their country.

***As far as I know, when you work abroad, you will feel different things about your own country,*** Mou said. ***So, for those who return to their country and can bring their national team to the final match of the World Cup, it is a remarkable achievement***.

<center>![download (6).jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUbyCzQ8WtBzGkuPGowVbfoT6fBu2uCRCRNYwxMZafngD/download%20(6).jpg)</center>
For the first time, Croatia were able to pitch to the World Cup finals after beating England in the semifinals with a score of 2-1 through extra time.

Had left earlier through a free kick goal from Kieran Trippier when the game has been running for five minutes, Zlatko Dalic coaching squad can only be equalized in the 68th minute through midfielder Ivan Perisic kick.

In extra-time, exactly in the 109th minute, Croatia's decisive victory goal was scored by Mario Mandzukic utilizing the chaos in front of goal England, who was then escorted goalkeeper Jordan Pickford.

On the result, Croatia will face France in the final round on Sunday, July 15, 2018. Meanwhile, England will meet Belgium in the third championship match on Saturday night.
<center></center>

<center>![12.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRS6CjAD9a4BLUavZs6wb7bce6qpFcJh2Fp7JScxzDxcv/12.png)</center>

author: anak123
title: Shining in the 2018 World Cup, Ante Rebic Became a Huge Club Inc
body:
![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)<center></center>
Hello all sports lovers, Croatia winger Ante Rebic who shines at the 2018 World Cup to be hunted by big European clubs. At least his name is attributed to four major clubs.
Rebic who currently plays for German League club Eintracht Frankfrut is rumored to be in demand by at least three English Premier League clubs: Tottenham Hotspur, Arsenal and Manchester United. In addition, German giants Bayern Munich and Italian Serie A club Napoli are also known to be interested in the services of the 24-year-old footballer.
<center>![3.6.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcBaR4oT2c5r7RoTJCQwms3qg2tKRDeo9KbLbFct9oV7n/3.6.jpg)</center>
According to the pages of The Sun, Tottenham actually been targeting Rebic for a long time. But they are the first by Fiorentina who brought him from Croatian club RNK Split in 2013.
Rebic appearance in the 2018 World Cup this makes Tottenham again glanced at him. Although only contributed one goal, but the role of Rebic on the right side of the Croatian attack line is considered very good.
<center></center>
However, this time Tottenham have to face tough competition from other big clubs. Manchester Evening News page states that Manchester United is ready poured funds of 44 million pounds sterling as requested by Eintracht Frankfrut. Incidentally Manchester United is short of stock players in that position.

While from Germany reported that Bayern Munich legend, Lothar Mattheus, support his former club to recruit Rebic. In fact, the Sport Bild page mentions that Bayern Munich will soon realize the transfer after the 2018 World Cup.
<center>![maskot dan logo Piala Dunia 2018 Russia.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVtjsBYuEgkprnRiN6kDBiCT694GemMZF4sKSsN5yXHiw/maskot%20dan%20logo%20Piala%20Dunia%202018%20Russia.jpg)</center>
Eiffel Sports Director Frankfrut, Fredi Bobic, said that it has not received an offer for Ante Rebic. However, he signaled that they were ready to sell him if there was a lucrative offer.
"So far I can be sure there is no offer coming in and we are planning a good season for Ante Rebic next season," he said.

"Our players and team coaches watched their World Cup games together in their training camp in the US They are all very enthusiastic about the game of Ante."

"Of course we know that there are many things that can happen if big clubs make an offer for Ante financially, Eintracht can not compete with big teams, so anything can happen later," he continued.
<center>![pi.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUa7unRdkikyPbqshsrnY1qHzGorWCvWL9en1PKRZwN5s/pi.png)</center>
But talks about the transfer of Ante Rebic still seem to be delayed at least until the 2018 World Cup final match on July 15 next. Rebic still have to help Croatia undergo a final game counter French.

author: saifulanwar
title: 2018 World Cup Final: Nike Vs Nike
body:
<center>![l1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdos13BTeVFPWc8VC5gQvoQkc4vZSWdMs8VH7i5yZ2vwH/l1.jpg)</center>
hello all sports lovers Final World Cup 2018 definitely won by Nike. Both teams meet in the finals, France and Croatia, both using Nike products.

It's for the first time in history. American sports producer is now ahead of his rival, Adidas, who is FIFA's longstanding and leading partner and World Cup.

<center>![3.5.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRXvBQUBmKFPKiomVTMjroyyBbK8kX1BQxytoyaVk4kLi/3.5.jpg)</center>
"We already have three of the four teams entering the semi-finals, then both teams reach the finals, which is the first time for Nike," said Elliot Hill, President of Nike Consumer and Markets.
He is happy for his achievements. "We've been playing football for over 20 years, and this is the first time we have all Nike, with both teams using Nike products."
Adidas sponsors 12 of the 32 teams in Russia's World Cup finals. While Nike only sponsor 10 teams. But one of his most favored clients, Germany, was eliminated early in the group stage, while eight other teams advanced to the last 16.

<center>![maskot dan logo Piala Dunia 2018 Russia.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVtjsBYuEgkprnRiN6kDBiCT694GemMZF4sKSsN5yXHiw/maskot%20dan%20logo%20Piala%20Dunia%202018%20Russia.jpg)</center>
"In addition to the kit, we have had great success with our players," Hill said. "We have more than 65 percent of athletes wearing Nike shoes, that's more than all other brands combined, so this is a very successful World Cup for us, on and off the field."
In addition to using Nike and Adidas, a total of 2018 World Cup participants used other products, namely Puma (providing kit for four teams), New Balance (two), and Errea, Hummel, Uhlsport, and Umbro (one team).

author: g10a
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Finals
body:
###
Almost! Almost!
Few hours left before the [Play-off for third place](https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/matches/?#knockoutphase) will take over, the Belgium against England match. ![CUP.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmQSEnbQkmw1x5yg3PP37ZnMf65fUW9Vc4ccToc2ZXiCNw)
[SOURCE](https://www.deviantart.com/ant-ony/art/Russia-World-Cup-2018-749283925)
*See I really hate my crystal ball, he showed me that either France or England and Belgium or Croatia will be in the final. But wait, that damn crystal ball is so clever didnât he? Look at the list its France vs Croatia will be fighting for the championship match.* Although Belgium was not lucky in their match against France with score 1-0 in favor with France, I knew It but I just skipped the right score and I predicted the score of 2-1 I told you almost I shouldâve summoned the black spirit for that. ![semi-.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmYUT4nNkXPxSkBEquREiqHM3KVDsuzfFVXcoS5ApdcaHQ) But what about England I just canât believe what had happened? I really thought England would win over Croatia since they were the champion during the FIFA 2017 that was held in South Korea from May 20 to June 11 2017. >As per my private and free lawyer sir @long888âs, I should not ask or say any negative thing to myself or to somebody cozâ the universe have itâs ears to hear us. The universe might command its soldier called âThe Law of Attractionâ to make those things happened. So if its effective and really functional, I think I helped France already. Sorry England I mentioned in my semifinals post this line lol. What do you think, can England again bring the crown at this time? I hope they give chance to another team. I bet France for the champion but we still don't know yet so let's wait for tonight's match with France VS Belgium. Check my post [HERE](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@g10a/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections-for-the-semi-finals-2331b36b3630eest) ![eng.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qmcaro1dHzeLpipTNGeT18G7E9A4asY7pwgMD89HokYrSp)
[SOURCE](https://www.footballmatchpreview.com/world-cup-belgium-vs-england-odds-for-july-13-2018/)
For todayâs match, Belgium will fight against England. Wish them luck, who will take the third place and whoever the team will be beaten by the opponent will take the 4th place. I think I need the crystal clear prediction of my damn crystal ball at this time, as this will be the last 2 fights and nothing more before the champion will be announced on 15th July 2018 20:00H. Hmm but I donât trust him anymore so Iâll go with my peek-a-boo strategy in picking my teams haha. Can France again take the crown of a world title for the second time after twenty years? France hosted the **[1998 FIFA World Cup](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1998_FIFA_World_Cup),** the **[16th FIFA World Cup](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1998_FIFA_World_Cup)** that was happened from 10 June to 12 July 1998. France took their first title against the defending champion Brazil with the score of 3-0. ![france.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmcMHWAo1whJF24hfKKgjoRJFy9kf9LsJGTLt4rwA2AWQc)
[SOURCE](http://bricsjournal.com/2018-fifa-world-cup-russia-semi-finals-review/)
Do you think Croatia can beat France and take their First title of [FIFA World Cup]( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA_World_Cup)? Well, Croatia have been in FIFA World Cup for five occasions that was on 1998, 2002, 2006, 2014 and at present (2018). Surprisingly, the best result that Croatia reached until the final is the **[2018 FIFA World Cup]( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_FIFA_World_Cup).** What do you think?, they might be preparing from 2015 up to 2017 for this event. Woooh!! Weâll wait for tomorrowâs result. So here is my prediction for the [Play-off (for third place) and for the Final](https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/matches/?#knockoutphase). Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 0 | Belgium | vs | England | 1 2 | France | vs | Croatia | 1 ### To join this awesome contest, you may check it [HERE](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/semi-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool). #
CHEERS!

author: jonelescalona
title: Belgium Vs England / For the 3rd Place / Russia 2018
body:
<center>![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmd9p729WiWBmz3bXxJyD6GcGeWh2Czb21wcioYAVkeuYp/image.png)
[Fuente](https://e.ad.amtv.pe/futbol-mundial-belgica-vs-inglaterra-vivo-online-directv-tercer-puesto-mundial-n329857-620x349-485808.jpg)</center>

Today 14 of June, Belgium and England will face for the third place of this great World Cup Russia 2018. These teams have already faced each other in the group stage, where neither wanted to risk and with rumors that the English delivered the game to remain On the side of the key easier or favorable for them, I play a game not very showy and relaxed for both.

Now for the third place promises a tough game and several goals with the two teams with more goals scored in this world. England was eliminated in the extensions before a brave and fierce Croatia that did not deliver the match and achieved a great triumph.

The English could not close the game after scoring a goal in minute 5, youth and lack of experience affection to ensure the game. On the other hand Belgium lost before a great France favorite to take the cup of the world.

These two sets have the top 2 world scorers ** Harry Kane ** with 6 goals and Romelu Lukaku with 4 goals. They are two very offensive teams, although in the semi they lacked that offensive that they showed in the group phase. We are expecting a nice match where my favorite will be Belgium who showed a good World Cup by overcoming a difficult Brazil.

**Forecast:**
Belgium 3 - 1 England
